title: NFL Prediction Response
description: Structured output schema for NFL game predictions

reasoning.description: Brief 2-3 sentence analysis of the matchup

confidence.description: Confidence level in the prediction (50-90, where 50 is toss-up, 70 is confident)

spread.description: Point spread prediction (negative = home favored, positive = away favored)

total.description: Combined total points for both teams (typical NFL range: 35-65 points)
